alert.note: Alert for Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 2:03AM MST until January 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts up to 8 inches near Steamboat Springs. * WHERE...Upper Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
